text: The 1930–31 Divizia A was the nineteenth season of Divizia A, the top-level football league of Romania. ==Participating teams== {|class="wikitable" |-style="background:#ccc;font-weight:bold" |Region || Team |- | East | Maccabi Cernăuţi |- | North | Crişana Oradea |- | South | Prahova Ploieşti |- | Center | Societatea Gimnastică Sibiu |- | West | UD Reşiţa |} ==Final Tournament of Regions== ===Preliminary round=== ===Semifinals=== ===Final=== June 28, 1931, Reşiţa ==References== Category:Liga I seasons Romania Category:1930–31 in Romanian football
title: 1930–31 Divizia A
